title: Gandhar Bhatawadekar
text: Gandhar Bhatawadekar (born 8 July 1993) is an Indian <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er. He made his <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class</a> debut for <a href="Railways%20cricket%20team">Railways</a> in the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Ranji%20Trophy">2018–19 Ranji Trophy</a> on 30 December 2018. He made his <a href="Twenty20">Twenty20</a> debut for Railways in the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Syed%20Mushtaq%20Ali%20Trophy">2018–19 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy</a> on 9 March 2019.
